title: Kim Kardashian Went to Makeup School (When She Was 14) | Allure
text:
By Caitlin Heikkila An inside look at Kim K.'s makeup school, Taylor Swift's connection to a weight-loss success story, a celebrity who is totally pulling off green hair, and more, in today's Alluring Links. Here's something we bet you didn't know about Kim Kardashian: She went to makeup school when she was 14 years old. Marie Claire checked it out. [Marie Claire] Hold up. Bloggers get paid how much for their Instagram posts?! [Who What Wear] Would you give up your foundation? These four women did. [Refinery 29] Watch Disney star Laura Marano attempt to apply liquid eyeliner with her eyes closed. [StyleCaster] Yep, flared jeans are back. [Who What Wear] A man who lost more than 400 pounds credits his progress to Taylor Swift. [People] Put away your blow-dryer, curling iron, and flatiron. Here's how to master air-drying. [Teen Vogue] Glasses wearers, rejoice. Here are 13 tips for doing your makeup while flattering your frames. [Australian Cosmopolitan] Jay Manuel's Instagram photo of Coco Rocha makes us want to wear blue mascara 24/7. [Instagram] This is what Blake Lively's face would look like if it was entirely made of food, just in case you were wondering. [Instagram] Jared Leto has bright-green hair (and of course pulls it off). [The Cut] By signing up, you agree to our User Agreement and Privacy Policy & Cookie Statement.
